meta.name: description
meta.content: Pinnacle Charter Schools is a group of tuition-free, accredited, Arizona public charter schools, serving students in grades 6-12.

meta.name: generator
meta.title: Pinnacle Charter Schools | Leading Charter School in Arizona

div.p: Pinnacle Charter Schools is a group of tuition-free, accredited, Arizona public charter schools, serving students in grades 6-12. Enrollment is open to all students, with new classes starting every Monday throughout the school year. Our online schools provide opportunities for students to find the right fit for their academic needs.

p.br: For students who need more structure, we have several campuses in Arizona where students can complete their virtual course with the benefit of an onsite instructor.
For high school students looking for a challenge or to boost their GPA for college admissions, we offer honors class in English, math, science, and social studies.
Everyone needs extra help now and again, and our students are no different. We offer specialized high school classes to help students recover any lost credits.
Our online virtual learning platform allows students to log in to class from anywhere in the world to work in their course or communicate with their state highly qualified instructor.

Our flexible, online curriculum aligns Common Core State Standards and Arizona K-12 Academic Standards. Accrediting through Cognia formerly AdvancED, you can be sure your student is receiving top notch instruction.
Our teachers are highly flexible and will help cater to your student’s needs. Whether you student is an academic rock star or needs extra time and support, we've got you covered.

div.style: background: url('/images/parallax.jpg') no-repeat center; background-size: cover; background-attachment: fixed; margin-bottom: 30px;

div.p: Failure inevitable but any failure can be turned into a success with drive and determination. Some inspirational stories where they made the most of the opportunity that knock them when least expected.

p.span:
Before I started attending Pinnacle, I wanted to give up on everything, including school, but I didn’t! Thanks to Pinnacle.
I just had to find the right people and right school that could help me. Pinnacle lined up perfectly with what I wanted and needed and I was committed to giving it a try. After orientation I approached my classes with great energy because I knew this was an exciting opportunity. The staff was there for me through every step, no matter what dilemma I was facing. To me this school was flexible and had every class I needed to be successful.

h2.a: Pinnacle is there for your assistance!

img.strong: During these difficult times, Pinnacle Charter Schools instructors and staff will be dedicatedly available from 9:30 am to 6 pm, Monday to Friday for all of our students and parents from March 30th!

p.strong: For more information, contact us at (888) 567-1844.

Other schools closed their doors, but Pinnacle is here for students 24/7.

h2.a: 11-year-old boy airlifted off of Camelback Mountain in Phoenix

div.p: An 11-year-old boy was airlifted off of Camelback Mountain on Monday in Phoenix, fire officials said.
The Phoenix Fire Department released multiple videos of officials wheeling the boy through the mountain and into a helicopter.

h2.a: Pinnacle Charter Schools have improved in their performance!

div.p: Pinnacle Charter Schools have improved in their performance! Our performance levels released by the Arizona Department of Education are:

ul.li: We place our students’ academic, social, & emotional needs as the focus of our work
We trust in our student’s ability to learn, and fully accept responsibility for their learning
We strive to eliminate barriers to our students learning
We recruit and develop a culturally diverse and competent workforce
We hold our employees to high standards of excellent
We ensure our employees have a happy, healthy, supportive, and safe work environment
We ensure our staff have opportunities to collaborate and improve their craft
We believe all people are valuable to our organization
We assert that all people have the right to respect and dignity
We value the variety that our diverse culture provides
We gain from and appreciate the voices of diversity in our community
We act with integrity in all that we say and do
We behave with civility, knowing that our words and actions have power
We act with truthfulness and trustworthiness
We take full responsibility for all our actions

div.p: I have been at Pinnacle since June 2016, and I am proud that I have not missed a day of school. Pinnacle has helped me become a model student and to help others as much as possible.
I started at Pinnacle in August of 2016 as a new mom, determined to finish school. Pinnacle helped me catch up on credits, and now I am only one class away from being ready to graduate early!
I have been working hard all year to catch up and get ahead. Pinnacle Charter Schools helped me get my life on track. Thank you Pinnacle!

p.strong: Pinnacle Charter Schools provides a tuition-free education for students to find the right fit for their academic needs. Enrollment is open to all students from grades 6 to 12, every day throughout the school year.

ul.li:
2224 W. Southern Avenue, Suite 1
Tempe, AZ 85282

Monday-Friday: 8:00 AM — 05:00 PM
Saturday & Sunday: Closed
